alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern DeWitt, southeastern Guadalupe, northern Karnes, southwestern Gonzales and central Wilson Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Poth to near Cestohowa to 8 miles east of Gillett. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Floresville, Karnes City, Poth, Stockdale, Kosciusko, Nixon, Falls City, Smiley, Pandora, Gillett, Cestohowa, Cheapside, Sutherland Springs, Westhoff, Leesville, Ecleto, Helena, Pana Maria, Gruenau and New Davy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: De Witt; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Wilson
